page.title: 03HOME LIFE IN POYNTON (2)
page.content: One family goes away on holiday whenever they can as they own a business and cannot have proper holidays. Nearly all the people said they were happy with the size of their gardens which varied in length. Our final question was about the changes which have taken place over the past 20years or so. They all agreed that the village had grown in size, more houses had been built. There is also a lot more traffic on the roads,these had also become dangerous. Some interesting places had gone, such as the garden for the blind, and the market garden. But people were pleased that the canal had been tidied and the walkway made along the old railway line. Everyone agreed it was a pleasant place to live.
